courseDetails.title: The SQL Programming Essentials Immersive Training
courseDetails.shortDescription: Learn SQL Programming step by step and know how it works. Building, Accessing and Manipulating databases and tables
courseDetails.longDescription:
Hello and welcome to The SQL Programming Essentials 2023 Immersive Training.

Mastering How to build, work with, handle and manage databases can be a very useful skill for any programmer, developer and also, non-programmers. And by the end of this course you'll be able to build, work with and manage databases easily and in no time!

This is a very powerful tool for everyone who wants to become a professional developer, engineer or data scientist.

Structure Query Language(SQL) is one of the most important skills that any programmer, developer, engineer or even an expert must possess, who wants to succeed in his practical life. It really facilitates a lot and a lot in accessing and manipulating data.

In this immersive training you'll learn everything you need to program with the SQL language the right way, and you'll become a SQL Programming Rockstar.


You'll learn:

  • SQL tools and the working environments

  • Selecting, Modifying, Inserting, Updating and deleting Data

  • Working with Different data types and operations in SQL

  • Sorting and limiting tables

  • Powerful SQL functions and aggregation

  • Building Database and tables easily and handling them

  • Setting rules to tables data

  • Managing and Joining Multiple tables at the same time

  • Set Conditions and insert the true values in a column in the result-set

  • Handling the result-set headers

  • Solve the the useful exercise of this training to apply everything you learnt

All that and more, in addition to the instructor QA Support.


Hi, My name is Ahmed Ibrahim, I'm A Data and Machine Learning Software Engineer and I'll be the instructor for this SQL Programming Course. And if you need any help during this immersive training, please don't hesitate to ask me, and I'll answer you as soon as possible.

Learn and practice the essential concepts of SQL Programming to become a professional database engineer effectively and quickly without wasting your valuable time.

So, what are you waiting for, enroll now to go through this immersive and powerful training of the most popular Database Programming Language on the market, SQL.

Become A SQL Programmer and Rockstar in no time!

Let’s get started

Anyone who wants to become a Professional Database Engineer in the future

courseDetails.title: Revit MEP Specialization - Electrical, Plumbing and HVAC
courseDetails.shortDescription: Complete course for the mechanical, electrical, and plumbing (MEP) disciplines for the building design and construction
courseDetails.longDescription:
Revit MEP Electromechanical Specialization Course is the perfect way for professionals to learn the fundamentals of BIM design and become specialized in Revit. This course provides an in-depth learning experience that covers everything from basic principles to advanced techniques. It covers topics such as drafting, modeling, and visualization, as well as the use of tools such as Autodesk Revit. 

#AulaGEO

Through this specialization course, learners will be able to become proficient in using Revit MEP for projects such as  electrical systems, plumbing systems & HVAC systems. With a comprehensive curriculum that covers topics such as 3D modeling, visualization techniques, and project coordination, this course arms students with the skills needed to excel in your career path.



CONTENT

PART I - Electrical

During the development of the course we will pay attention to the necessary configuration within a Revit project to be able to execute electrical calculations. We will show you how to work with circuits, boards, voltage types and electrical distribution systems. You will learn how to extract data from circuits and create dashboard views that balance design loads.

Finally, we will show you how to create detailed reports of parts, conductors and electrical pipes.

courseDetails.title: Convert a one page HTML5 Template to a WordPress Theme
courseDetails.shortDescription: Get a minimum viable WordPress theme by converting a simple one page HTML5 template into a fully functional theme.
courseDetails.longDescription:
100% Answer Rate! Every single question posted to this class is answered within 24 hours by the instructor.

"Recently I decided to master Wordpress (…). I tried several ebooks and online tutorials but none of them explain things as clear as you did. I really like the approach you took to train your students.! (...) I know providing a course is hard, but providing a quality course is MUCH HARDER."

(Message from student Seng Fei Yang)

"This course was exactly what I was looking for! If you are a web developer looking for an introduction on how to get started with Wordpress or how to migrate an existing website to Wordpress, this is the perfect, quick, concise starting point. Marcelo is organized, knowledgable, and to the point. I highly recommend this course."

(Soren Baird)

*******************************************************************************

Have you thought about creating a WordPress theme from a simple HTML5 template?

In this course I will guide you, step by step, and teach you how to convert a simple one-page HTML5 template into a highly dynamic, fully functional WordPress theme.

You will learn the basic techniques used for creating a WordPress theme. In the end, you'll be able to use the same techniques to convert your own HTML5 website into a fully functional theme.

This course is not intended to be a definitive course on WordPress theme development, but it will be your first contact with the subject.

Learn How to Convert a Simple One-Page HTML5 Template into a WordPress Theme

• Learn the basic techniques for developing a WordPress theme

• Understand how a WordPress theme works

• Learn how to turn a static HTML5 template into a highly dynamic WordPress theme

Course Overview

This course is not meant to be the ultimate course on WordPress theme development, but it will be your first contact with this amazing subject.

Throughout the class, you'll watch over my shoulders how to convert a simple HTML5 template into a fully functional WordPress theme.

This course has been carefully designed for professionals who already have minimal knowledge of HTML, CSS, PHP and wish to take a step forward in understanding how WordPress theme works.

We will start from a simple one-page template, which will be transformed little by little into a WordPress theme. Along the way, you'll learn how to install WordPress in the right way, as well as the right way to transfer CSS and Javascript files from a template to a WordPress theme.

We will learn to include Bootstrap and make the theme responsive, keeping the original features and the visual aspect of the HTML template within WordPress.

And the most important! We will learn to make the template content highly dynamic within WordPress, from menus to text and image areas. I mean, you'll be able to create a theme that can be easily updated by you or your clients.

We will also learn how to implement a fully dynamic post list by creating a custom WordPress loop!

You'll also have access to all the files created during lessons. All of them well organized for you to review or correct your own code. 

At the end of the course, you will have learned how to create your own theme, from any HTML5 template, and confidently recreate a theme of your own. In addition, at the end of the course, you will receive Udemy's exclusive certificate!

Are you ready? So, let's get started
targetAudiences: Web designers/programmers who want to learn how to convert HTML to a WordPress theme

courseDetails.title: XML and XSD: a complete W3C-content based course (+10 hours)
courseDetails.shortDescription: The complete XML/XSD content from W3Schools, with much better explanations and practical examples with Eclipse IDE
courseDetails.longDescription:
XML and XSD: a complete W3C-content based course (+10 hours)
The complete XML/XSD content from W3Schools, with much better explanations and practical examples w/ Eclipse IDE - 2019

"XML (Extensible Markup Language) is a markup language that defines a set of rules for encoding documents in a format that is both human-readable and machine-readable. The World Wide Web Consortium's XML 1.0 Specification of 1998 and several other related specifications - all of them free open standards - define XML. The design goals of XML emphasize simplicity, generality, and usability across the Internet. It is a textual data format with strong support via Unicode for different human languages. Although the design of XML focuses on documents, the language is widely used for the representation of arbitrary data structures such as those used in web services. Several schema systems exist to aid in the definition of XML-based languages, while programmers have developed many application programming interfaces (APIs) to aid the processing of XML data."

"XSD (XML Schema Definition), a recommendation of the World Wide Web Consortium (W3C), specifies how to formally describe the elements in an Extensible Markup Language (XML) document. It can be used by programmers to verify each piece of item content in a document. They can check if it adheres to the description of the element it is placed in. Like all XML schema languages, XSD can be used to express a set of rules to which an XML document must conform in order to be considered "valid" according to that schema. However, unlike most other schema languages, XSD was also designed with the intent that determination of a document's validity would produce a collection of information adhering to specific data types. Such a post-validation infoset can be useful in the development of XML document processing software."


What you'll learn from this course:

- You will learn all the theory about how to use XML language correctly, as well as all about its general and specific syntaxes, according to the World Wide Web Consortium (W3C) official recommendations.

- You will learn all the practice about how to code your XML files, using the elements, attributes and types - default and custom ones - from the referred XSD schemas, as well as how to test the correctness and validation of your XML instances against their referred XSD docs using Eclipse IDE automation.

- You will adventure into the complete theory background about how to create your own XSD schema documents and master the details about XSD general and specific syntaxes, according to W3C official specifications.

- You will practice, through tens of examples, how to code your own XSD files, using the 3 design methods suggested by W3C, as well as how to take advantage of all main base elements, attributes and types (default W3C library/namespace) to create your own personalized XML/XSD components.

- You will have pretty clear what default and custom namespaces are, as well as prefixes, both at the XML instances as at the XSD documents. You'll learn how to import and include multiple XSD documents into one same XSD and also how to refer to multiple XSD documents from one same XML instance, nice and easy... even using your own personal brand as the prefix for customizing your code (in my case: danielpm1982).

- All this course's theory, as well as the good practices and techniques used, are based on the World Wide Web Consortium (W3C) and W3Schools contents, here with much better and complete explanations and practical examples.

- After doing this course, you'll understand much easier all the document types used at Web Services development, or any other application that uses XML and XSD (or WSDL).

- All source codes are available at my GitHub, as well as attached to each practice lecture, as a zip file. You can easily download, study, reuse and test them yourself, for learning purposes, and even create much better examples. This is how you learn: starting from the basics and evolving, through practicing, until proficiency. All at your own pace and time and re-watching any lecture as many times as you want.

- Additional content, as WSDL and JSON theory and practical lectures, as well as lectures with sample Web Services projects, demonstrating the real world applicability of XML, XSD, WSDL and JSON, will be added incrementally within the next months, at this same course. But you can finish this course with the current content, as it is, and receive your Udemy Certification on that… and if you want, you may return later, watch the future extra content lectures (WSDL and JSON) and, at the end, receive another Udemy Certification with the updated content and course name. courseDetails.title: Intro to ISO 14001:2015 EMS -Environmental Management System
courseDetails.shortDescription: Understand the basics quick and easy
courseDetails.longDescription:
This course is an easy introductory overview of ISO 14001:2015. The teaching style is a presentation with voiceover. After completing this course you'll have a basic understanding of the Plan-Do-Check-Act methodology, how it's applied to create ISO 14001:2015, the purpose of the standard, and what it is comprised of.

The standard is detailed in a document consisting of 10 clauses as per Annex SL, just like all the other ISO management systems. In this course, I'll be giving you a brief explanation of each of the clauses. The standard is designed to help organizations create a framework on which to base their environmental management system.

It focuses on understanding the needs and expectations of interested parties, and the issues surrounding the environmental performance of the organization to derive environmental objectives and determine compliance obligations. It further expects leadership to play an active key role in driving the organization towards achieving strategic goals. And, thus, developing an Environmental Management System that is comprised of competent staff, well-organized resources, and effective procedures to monitor, analyze and evaluate environmental aspects and causes of pollution.

ISO 14001:2015 is a generic management system that doesn’t specify specific goals, and instead provides a framework for organizations to follow to meet the environmental objectives they set themselves.
targetAudiences: Anyone who wants to learn the basics of ISO 14001:2015
Anyone who wants to expand their knowledge about Management Systems
Anyone in any commerce field who wants to learn about popular ISOs

courseDetails.shortDescription: Learn all the needed skills and Land your Job Guarantee
courseDetails.longDescription:
DevOps is a combination of software development and information technology operations that enables businesses to deliver applications at a faster pace. It brings together development and operations teams so there are fewer redundancies in the software development process.

DevSecOps is a culture shift in the software industry that aims to bake security into the rapid-release cycles that are typical of modern application development and deployment.


DevOps has revolutionized workplaces in many ways. The number of DevOps-related jobs are increasing, while its rank as an in-demand job.


DevOps is important because it's a software development and operations approach that enables faster development of new products and easier maintenance of existing deployments.


What is Infrastructure as Code (IAC) ?
Infrastructure as Code (IaC) is the managing and provisioning of infrastructure through code instead of through manual processes.

With IaC, configuration files are created that contain your infrastructure specifications, which makes it easier to edit and distribute configurations. It also ensures that you provision the same environment every time.


What is Terraform ?

Terraform is an open-source infrastructure as code software tool created by HashiCorp. Users define and provide data center infrastructure using a declarative configuration language known as HashiCorp Configuration Language, or optionally JSON.
targetAudiences: DevOps Engineers
DevSecOps Engineers
Developers
System Administrator
IT Engineers

courseDetails.title: PHR, SPHR & aPHR : Professional in Human Resources
courseDetails.shortDescription: PHR, SPHR & aPHR, Professional in Human Resources, Senior Professional in Human Resources, Associate Professional
courseDetails.longDescription:
PHR, SPHR & aPHR in Human Resources

In the dynamic and ever-evolving world of Human Resources (HR), staying ahead of the curve is essential for HR professionals to succeed. Acquiring the right certifications not only boosts your credibility but also empowers you to tackle complex HR challenges effectively. Three prominent certifications stand out in the field: Professional in Human Resources (PHR), Senior Professional in Human Resources (SPHR), and Associate Professional in Human Resources (aPHR). In this course, we will explore each of these certifications, their significance, and why obtaining one could be a pivotal step in your HR career.

Professional in Human Resources (PHR):

The PHR certification, awarded by the HR Certification Institute (HRCI), is designed for HR professionals with a strong foundational knowledge and a few years of experience in the field. The exam assesses their skills in core HR areas, including employee relations, workforce planning, compensation, benefits, and HR development.

Senior Professional in Human Resources (SPHR):

The SPHR certification, also offered by the HRCI, is designed for HR professionals with extensive experience in strategic HR management. This certification targets individuals who possess a broader understanding of HR's role in an organization and are involved in shaping HR policies and strategies.

Associate Professional in Human Resources (aPHR):

The aPHR certification, provided by the HR Certification Institute (HRCI) as well, is tailored for individuals who are just starting their HR careers or transitioning into HR from other fields. This entry-level certification serves as a stepping stone for those looking to establish a strong HR foundation.

Learning Objectives for Professional Human Resources:

Business Management, Talent Planning, and Acquisition: a. Understand the importance of aligning HR strategies with overall business goals. b. Learn how to forecast talent needs and create effective talent acquisition strategies. c. Explore methods for identifying and attracting top talent. d. Discover techniques for conducting effective interviews and candidate assessments.

  1. Learning and Development, Total Rewards: a. Comprehend the significance of employee development and continuous learning in organizational success. b. Explore different learning and development methods and their applications. c. Understand the concept of total rewards and its role in attracting, motivating, and retaining employees. d. Learn how to design and implement a comprehensive total rewards strategy.

  2. Employee and Labor Relations: a. Understand the key principles and laws governing employee and labor relations. b. Learn techniques for fostering positive employee relations and conflict resolution. c. Explore the collective bargaining process and negotiation skills for labor agreements. d. Understand grievance handling and dispute resolution procedures.

  3. Leadership and Strategy: a. Develop an understanding of various leadership styles and their impact on employee motivation and performance. b. Learn how HR professionals can contribute to the formulation and execution of organizational strategies. c. Explore ways to identify and develop future leaders within the organization. d. Understand the role of HR in fostering a culture of innovation and adaptability.

  4. Employee Relations and Engagement: a. Understand the importance of employee engagement in driving productivity and organizational success. b. Learn methods for measuring employee engagement and interpreting results. c. Explore strategies to enhance employee morale and job satisfaction. d. Understand the role of HR in creating a positive work environment that fosters collaboration and teamwork.

  5. HR Operations, Recruitment, and Selection & Compensation and Benefits: a. Gain an understanding of the fundamental HR operations and their importance in supporting organizational functions. b. Learn best practices for recruitment and selection to attract the right talent. c. Understand the principles of job analysis and job evaluation to design effective compensation and benefits structures. d. Learn how HR professionals can promote a safe and healthy work environment. c. Understand the importance of employee well-being and the impact on overall productivity. d. courseDetails.title: Executive Diploma in Corporate Entrepreneurship
courseDetails.shortDescription: MTF Institute Executive Diploma in Corporate Entrepreneurship, Intrapreneurship, Startup, MBA Business Module, Growth
courseDetails.longDescription:
Welcome to program: Executive Diploma in Corporate Entrepreneurship


Program provided by MTF Institute of Management, Technology and Finance

MTF is the global educational and research institute with HQ at Lisbon, Portugal, focused on higher & professional hybrid (on-campus and online) education at areas: Business & Administration, Science & Technology, Banking & Finance.

MTF R&D center focused on research activities at areas: Artificial Intelligence, Machine Learning, Data Science, Big Data, WEB3, Blockchain, Cryptocurrency & Digital Assets, Metaverses, Digital Transformation, Fintech, Electronic Commerce, Internet of Things.

MTF is the official partner of: IBM, Intel, Microsoft, member of the Portuguese Chamber of Commerce and Industry, and resident of the incubator "The Fintech House of Portugal".

MTF is present in 199 countries and has been chosen by more than 140,000 students.


The Executive Diploma in Corporate Entrepreneurship is a program designed to equip professionals with the advanced skills, strategies, and visionary thinking required to navigate the intricate world of modern corporate entrepreneurship. This course offers a deep exploration of the dynamic landscape of corporate innovation and entrepreneurship, covering an  array of topics that are crucial for individuals aiming to spearhead innovation, drive growth, and foster entrepreneurial cultures within established organizations.


Course Outline:

Understanding Modern Corporate Entrepreneurship:

The Role of Innovation: Analyzing the central role of innovation as the driving force behind corporate entrepreneurship and market disruption. Distinguishing Entrepreneurship from Intrapreneurship.

Comparative Analysis: Differentiating between external entrepreneurship and internal intrapreneurship, emphasizing their distinct attributes and applications.

Real-world Case Studies: Exploring diverse examples of both entrepreneurship and intrapreneurship to showcase their practical implications.


Exploring Intrapreneurship Types and Case Studies:

Categories of Intrapreneurial Endeavors: Investigating various forms of intrapreneurship, including product innovation and process enhancement.

Intrapreneurship Success Stories: Examining case studies of successful intrapreneurial initiatives within renowned organizations across industries.


Challenges of Cultivating Corporate Entrepreneurship:

Identifying Obstacles: Analyzing the inherent challenges that organizations face when attempting to foster a culture of corporate entrepreneurship.

Strategies for Overcoming Challenges: Developing proactive strategies to address resistance to change, risk aversion, and organizational inertia.


Taxonomy of Intrapreneurial Personalities:

Intrapreneurial Archetypes: Defining different profiles of intrapreneurs, including idea generators, project champions, and disruptive catalysts.

Nurturing Intrapreneurial Talent: Strategies for recognizing and nurturing individuals with intrapreneurial potential within the workforce.


Nurturing and Leading Intrapreneurs:

Fostering a Supportive Ecosystem: Creating an environment that encourages creativity, experimentation, and calculated risk-taking.

Empowerment Strategies: Providing intrapreneurs with resources, autonomy, and mentorship to propel their innovative endeavors.


Becoming an Intrapreneurial Leader:

Personal Transformation: Cultivating the mindset and skillset necessary for individuals to lead with intrapreneurial spirit within their roles.

Influence and Impact: Strategies for inspiring teams, driving change, and championing innovation from within.


Diverse Models of Corporate Entrepreneurship:

Frameworks for Integration: Exploring a spectrum of models and frameworks organizations can adopt to infuse entrepreneurial principles into their DNA.

Case Studies: Analyzing the practical implementation of various models in successful corporate entrepreneurship initiatives.


Unlocking Growth with Strategic Innovation:

Growth Hacking Strategies: Delving into the innovative techniques and agile approaches that drive rapid business expansion.

Engines of Growth: Investigating the mechanisms that fuel accelerated growth in startups and established enterprises.

Market Expansion Theories and Growth Matrices:


Market Penetration vs. Expansion:

Exploring market expansion theories and their pivotal role in strategic decision-making for growth.

Growth Matrix Applications: Applying growth matrices to identify growth opportunities, allocate resources, and diversify product portfolios.


Corporate Venturing and Innovation Ecosystems:

Corporate Venturing Strategies: Understanding the concept of corporate venturing and its impact on driving innovation through external partnerships.

Navigating Innovation Ecosystems: Examining how organizations can collaborate with startups, academia, and research centers to fuel innovation.


Importance for Companies and Employees:

The landscape of modern business is marked by rapid technological advancements, evolving customer preferences, and dynamic competitive pressures. In such an environment, corporate entrepreneurship stands as a beacon of resilience and adaptability for organizations. The Comprehensive Executive Diploma in Corporate Entrepreneurship Excellence serves as a critical learning pathway for companies seeking to stay at the forefront of innovation and leverage entrepreneurial agility to secure sustainable growth.


For Companies:

Cultivating Innovation Culture: The course equips companies with the tools and methodologies to foster an innovation-driven culture, enabling them to stay ahead of disruption and drive continuous improvement.

Seizing New Opportunities: Organizations that embrace corporate entrepreneurship are better positioned to identify emerging market trends, seize untapped opportunities, and create innovative solutions that resonate with customers.

Navigating Disruption: The skills gained from this course empower companies to navigate disruptive forces by fostering an agile mindset, encouraging creative problem-solving, and capitalizing on change.


For Employees:

Career Acceleration: Individuals equipped with corporate entrepreneurship skills become invaluable assets to their organizations. They are poised to take on leadership roles, drive strategic initiatives, and contribute significantly to their companies' growth trajectories.

Entrepreneurial Skillset: Learning the art of corporate entrepreneurship imparts a versatile skillset that transcends job titles. Professionals gain the ability to identify market gaps, propose innovative solutions, and drive change even from within established hierarchies.

Personal Branding: Embracing corporate entrepreneurship fosters a reputation for being a proactive, innovative, and dynamic professional. This can open doors to exciting career opportunities and help individuals stand out in competitive job markets.


Leveraging Corporate Entrepreneurship for Career and Business Ventures:

The Executive Diploma in Corporate Entrepreneurship  not only equips individuals with skills to thrive within organizations but also empowers them to embark on entrepreneurial journeys of their own.


Career Advancement: Professionals who demonstrate a keen understanding of corporate entrepreneurship principles are more likely to be considered for leadership positions. Their ability to drive innovation and adapt to changing business landscapes makes them indispensable assets to any organization.


Entrepreneurial Endeavors: Armed with the mindset and skillset of corporate entrepreneurship, individuals are well-equipped to transition from being employees to becoming successful entrepreneurs. The course nurtures the spirit of calculated risk-taking, resource optimization, and strategic thinking – all essential components for entrepreneurial success.


The Executive Diploma in Corporate Entrepreneurship Excellence offers a transformative learning experience that bridges the gap between traditional business approaches and the demands of a rapidly evolving market. It empowers companies to become innovation powerhouses and individuals to carve out exceptional career trajectories or entrepreneurial journeys. Enroll in this program to embark on a transformative journey that merges innovation, leadership, and business acumen into a potent catalyst for growth and success.
targetAudiences: No special requirements. Course for any who want to build a career at management, corporate management, corporate culture, business and for everyone who wants to improve skills and knowledge at management.

courseDetails.title: CSO Chief Security Officer Executive Certification
courseDetails.shortDescription: Certified Chief Security Officer (CSO) Certification & Assessment by MTF Institute
courseDetails.longDescription:
Welcome to Certified Chief Security Officer (CSO) Assessment

This assessment helps to employees and companies in internal certification procedures.

Its not a course with theory, its exam for certification / assessment


Udemy doesn't provide certificates for exam type of courses yet. You may:

  1. Include info about Assessment / Certification to your CV / Linked in (with choosing of Institute of Management, Technology and Finance as a Educational Provider) after successful finishing of test

  2. Write us with screens of finished tests for getting of MTF type of diploma
    please also provide name/surname at Udemy and your preferred name for diploma

In case of any questions, or for certificate getting you may write us to email welcome  gtf . pt or find the contacts at our web site gtf . pt


Assessment Description:

The Chief Security Officer (CSO) assessment is a comprehensive evaluation designed to gauge the knowledge, skills, and expertise of individuals aspiring to or currently holding the position of a CSO within an organization. This assessment consists of 30 multiple-choice questions that cover various aspects of security management and practices. The questions are carefully crafted to assess the candidate's understanding of security principles, risk management, incident response, access control, network security, and other crucial areas related to the role of a CSO.


The importance of Chief Security Officer Assessment cannot be overstated, both for employees and companies. For employees, it serves as a platform to demonstrate their competence and expertise in security management. It allows them to showcase their knowledge of industry best practices, emerging threats, and the ability to develop and implement effective security strategies. By successfully completing the assessment, employees can strengthen their credibility and increase their chances of career advancement in the field of security management.


For companies, the Chief Security Officer Assessment plays a vital role in ensuring that the individual appointed or promoted to the CSO position possesses the necessary skills and knowledge to safeguard the organization's assets. Security is a critical aspect of any business, and having a competent CSO is essential for protecting sensitive information, mitigating risks, and ensuring business continuity. By conducting this assessment, companies can identify individuals who demonstrate a deep understanding of security management principles and are capable of leading the organization's security efforts effectively.


Moreover, the Chief Security Officer Assessment helps companies identify any skill gaps or areas that require further development within their existing security management team. It enables organizations to benchmark their security professionals against industry standards and identify areas of improvement. This assessment also aids in identifying potential candidates for training programs or professional development initiatives, allowing companies to invest in their employees' growth and enhance the overall security posture of the organization.


In terms of career building, a strong foundation in security management is highly beneficial. With the increasing frequency and sophistication of cyber and physical threats, organizations across various industries are placing significant emphasis on their security measures. This has created a high demand for skilled security professionals, including CSOs. By developing expertise in security management, individuals can position themselves for rewarding career opportunities in a wide range of sectors, such as finance, healthcare, technology, government, and more.


Professionals who excel in security management possess a unique skill set that includes risk assessment, incident response, policy development, compliance, and the ability to align security objectives with business goals. They play a crucial role in protecting organizations from internal and external threats, ensuring compliance with regulations, and building a culture of security awareness.


Furthermore, a successful career in security management often involves continuous learning and staying updated with the latest trends, technologies, and threats in the field. Professionals who demonstrate a commitment to ongoing professional development and acquire relevant certifications can enhance their marketability and open doors to higher-level positions, such as Chief Information Security Officer (CISO) or executive leadership roles.


In conclusion, the Chief Security Officer Assessment serves as a valuable tool for both employees and companies. It enables employees to demonstrate their expertise in security management and advance their careers in a rapidly growing field. For companies, this assessment ensures that they have competent leaders in place to protect their valuable assets and mitigate risks. Security management is a critical aspect of modern business operations, and individuals who excel in this field can carve out rewarding and impactful careers while safeguarding the interests of organizations in an ever-evolving threat landscape.

courseDetails.longDescription:
CAPM Certification Course : Certified Associate in Project Management - For your CAPM Exam Preparation

A Comprehensive Discussion to Becoming a Certified Associate in Project Management

In today's dynamic and competitive business landscape, effective project management is crucial for organizations to achieve their goals efficiently. The Certified Associate in Project Management (CAPM) credential, offered by the Project Management Institute (PMI), serves as an excellent stepping stone for those looking to enter the world of project management. Whether you're a recent graduate or a professional transitioning into project management, the CAPM certification can open doors to exciting opportunities. In this master course, we'll dive into the key aspects of the CAPM certification, its benefits, eligibility requirements, and how to prepare for the exam.

1. Introduction to Project Management: Explore the foundational concepts of project management, including its definition, key characteristics, and the importance of effective project management in various industries. Dive into the project environment, considering external and internal factors that influence project success. Understand the critical role of a Project Manager in initiating, planning, executing, monitoring, controlling, and closing projects.

2. Project Integration Management and Project Scope Management: Delve into the intricacies of project integration management, which involves coordinating various project aspects to ensure seamless execution. Understand how project scope management encompasses defining, planning, verifying, and controlling project scope to prevent scope creep and meet project objectives. Learn about techniques, tools, and best practices for successful integration and scope management.

3. Project Schedule Management and Project Cost Management: Examine the significance of project schedule management in defining project timelines, sequencing activities, and optimizing resource allocation. Study project cost management, including cost estimation, budgeting, monitoring, and controlling expenditures. Discover methods for creating realistic schedules and budgets while efficiently managing resources.

4. Project Quality Management and Project Resource Management: Explore the principles of project quality management, focusing on planning, assurance, and control processes to ensure deliverables meet or exceed stakeholders' expectations. Analyze project resource management, covering the identification, acquisition, and allocation of necessary resources, including human, material, and equipment resources, to accomplish project goals.

5. Project Communication Management and Project Risk Management: Understand the significance of effective project communication management, encompassing strategies for clear, timely, and accurate communication among stakeholders. Delve into project risk management, identifying, assessing, and mitigating potential risks that could impact project success. Explore risk response strategies and risk monitoring techniques.

6. Project Procurement Management and Project Stakeholder Management: Examine project procurement management, including processes related to acquiring goods and services from external sources. Understand the management of project contracts, vendor selection, and contract administration. Dive into project stakeholder management, identifying and engaging stakeholders, managing their expectations, and fostering positive stakeholder relationships.

This comprehensive exploration of project management processes and principles will provide you with a solid foundation for understanding the intricacies of managing projects across various domains.

The Certified Associate in Project Management (CAPM) certification is a valuable asset for anyone aspiring to build a career in project management. It offers a structured pathway to gaining fundamental project management knowledge, enhancing your skills, and opening doors to exciting job opportunities. By meeting the eligibility requirements, preparing diligently, and approaching the exam day with confidence, you can embark on a successful journey towards achieving your CAPM certification and making a meaningful impact in the world of project management.

courseDetails.title: CISSP - Certified Information Systems Security Professional
courseDetails.shortDescription: CISSP - Certified Information Systems Security Professional, (ISC)², CISSP Certification, CISSP Exam Preparation Course
courseDetails.longDescription:
CISSP - Certified Information Systems Security Professional

CISSP 101 Course: Your Guide to Becoming a Certified Information Systems Security Professional

Introduction

In today's interconnected world, the protection of sensitive information and the assurance of cybersecurity have become paramount. As technology advances, so do the threats to our digital assets. This is where the Certified Information Systems Security Professional (CISSP) certification comes into play. The CISSP certification is globally recognized and signifies a high level of expertise in information security. In this 101 course, we'll delve into the basics of the CISSP 101 course and explore why it's a crucial step towards a successful career in cybersecurity.

What is CISSP?

Certified Information Systems Security Professional (CISSP) is a renowned certification offered by (ISC)², the International Information System Security Certification Consortium. The CISSP certification is designed for professionals who want to demonstrate their knowledge and expertise in information security and cybersecurity practices.

Why Pursue CISSP Certification?

CISSP certification holds immense value for individuals seeking a career in information security. Here are some reasons why CISSP is highly regarded in the industry:

1. Global Recognition: CISSP is recognized worldwide as a mark of excellence in the field of cybersecurity. Holding this certification opens up opportunities on a global scale.

2. Industry Demand: With the increasing frequency and complexity of cyberattacks, organizations are actively seeking skilled professionals who can safeguard their digital assets. CISSP-certified individuals are in high demand across various industries.

3. Comprehensive Knowledge: The CISSP certification covers a wide range of topics, ensuring that certified professionals have a holistic understanding of security principles, practices, and technologies.

4. Career Advancement: CISSP certification can significantly boost your career. It can open doors to higher-paying positions, leadership roles, and consulting opportunities.

5. Professional Network: Becoming CISSP-certified connects you with a global community of security professionals, providing opportunities for networking, collaboration, and knowledge-sharing.

CISSP 101 Course Overview

The CISSP 101 course serves as an introduction to the world of CISSP certification. It provides foundational knowledge and prepares candidates for the rigorous CISSP exam. Here's what you can expect from the CISSP 101 course:

1. Domain Exploration: The CISSP certification exam is based on eight domains, including Security and Risk Management, Asset Security, Security Architecture and Engineering, Communication and Network Security, Identity and Access Management, Security Assessment and Testing, Security Operations, and Software Development Security. The CISSP 101 course gives you a glimpse into each domain, ensuring you have a solid foundation before diving into the exam preparation.

2. Security Principles: The course covers fundamental security principles, including confidentiality, integrity, availability, and non-repudiation. Understanding these principles is crucial for designing and implementing effective security measures.

3. Security Technologies: CISSP 101 introduces you to a variety of security technologies and tools commonly used in the industry. This knowledge helps you comprehend how different technologies contribute to overall security strategies.

4. Risk Management: Risk management is a critical aspect of information security. The course highlights the importance of risk assessment, analysis, and mitigation strategies to protect an organization's assets.

5. Legal and Ethical Considerations: Information security professionals must navigate legal and ethical challenges. CISSP 101 provides insights into relevant laws, regulations, and ethical practices that impact cybersecurity decisions.

Conclusion

The CISSP 101 course is the gateway to the world of Certified Information Systems Security Professionals. By enrolling in this course, you're taking the first step towards enhancing your knowledge, skills, and career prospects in the cybersecurity field. With the demand for skilled cybersecurity experts at an all-time high, CISSP certification can be your ticket to a fulfilling and impactful career. So, if you're passionate about safeguarding digital assets and contributing to a safer online world, consider embarking on the journey to become a CISSP-certified professional. Your expertise could be the shield that organizations need to fend off the ever-evolving threats in the digital landscape.

In this master course, I would like to teach the 8 major topics and 1 practice test:

1. Security and Risk Management

2. Asset Security

3. Security Architecture and Engineering

4. Communication and Network Security

5. Identity and Access Management (IAM)

6. Security Assessment and Testing

7. Security Operations

8. Software Development Security

9. Practice test

To pass of this practice test course, you must score at least 70% on the practice test.

In every question, I explained why the answer is correct!

courseDetails.title: Creating WordPress Plugins The Right Way
courseDetails.shortDescription: Create your first WordPress plugin using native APIs and classes, manage your own table, and much more
courseDetails.longDescription:
100% Answer Rate! Every single question posted to this class is answered within 24 hours by the instructor.

DISCLAIMER: before you enroll in this course, please read carefully the "Who is this course for?" section below. This course has prerequisites and MUST NOT be taken by students that don't have a solid foundation in programming.


Do you want to stop losing customers for not knowing how to create plugins?

Are you also trying desperately to learn how to create your own plugins, but are not succeeding? You've been trying for a few years now, but still haven't found good and up-to-date teaching material. Then got tired of simply looking at how long is the WordPress documentation for plugin creators.

Plugins are part of what makes WordPress be what it is, the most used content management system in the world, present in more than 30% of sites worldwide! Learning how to deal with the WordPress plugin engine will set you free from third-party tools. It will also put a powerful knowledge in your hands that will help you reach new clients, financial independence, or at least a new job or a promotion at work.

All will start with this course!

This course is unlike any course you've ever seen. It's about 100 lessons, organized in three amazing projects, in which I teach you everything I've been learning over the ten years I've been working with WordPress. Absolutely everything! This course won't hide anything. All subjects are covered in great depth, with the teaching style recognized by my more than 20,000 students around the world!

All this using only native WordPress tools. No using plugins to create another plugin!


What exactly will you learn?

Here is a shortlist of the main topics covered by this course. You will learn:

  • How to use WordPress action hooks and filters to your advantage to control the behavior of plugins and make them more flexible;

  • How to structure your projects in a cleaner and more flexible way using PHP classes and objects;

  • How to use the main native WordPress APIs, classes, and functions to create your plugin. For example, the Settings, Options, Widgets, Shortcode, Metabox APIs, and the methods of the very powerful $wpdb class;

  • How to create custom post types (CPTs), making WordPress the perfect framework for any project you want to create;

  • How to create your own taxonomies, custom menus, options pages, your own widgets and shortcodes with multiple options, metadata boxes with custom fields, etc;

  • How to add stylesheets and javascript in both the admin and the frontend and control them via the options pages;

  • How to install and preview what to do when installing, deactivating, and uninstalling the plugin;

  • How to control the plugin's template in the frontend, as well as create a WooCommerce-like template override system;

  • How to create specific theme support for your plugin.


And much more! How about learning how to manage a custom table for your plugin in the WordPress database?

Do you know all the WordPress tables? Do you know what they do and how they are structured? You'll learn all about them here!

In addition, you will learn how to perform all CRUD actions (create, read, update, and delete data) on your own table using the super powerful $wpdb class.

Have you ever thought of leaving the limitations that the WordPress system imposes and building your project based on a separate table? In this course, you will learn how to do it, understand in which cases it is necessary, and what are the advantages and disadvantages.

And it doesn't stop here...

What about using the frontend to let the user submit data to this table?

I think you didn't see that coming! Well, in this course you will understand what you will need to enable a logged-in user to submit information, which will be stored in a table automatically created by your plugin during installation.

You will also learn how to manage your own users by creating an account for them using native WordPress tools.

All this in a very secure way!

We will be constantly on the lookout for possible security threats that could compromise our application. We will use all security items such as nonces (ever heard of them?), string escaping, validations, sanitization, permission functions, error handling, and $wpdb's prepare() method.

How about making your plugin go international?

You will learn how to create plugins that are fully translatable. Customers from all over the world will be able to use them, as they will be fully compatible with Poedit or any WordPress translation plugin.


How is this course organized?

The course is divided into projects. In the beginning, we will have three projects. It doesn't sound like much, but they will give a fantastic idea of what is needed to basically understand how most of the plugins work.

In the first project, we will create a highly dynamic and fully customizable slideshow plugin. We will start with simple subjects such as directory structuring, methods of installing, deactivating, and uninstalling plugins. Then we will move on to intermediate topics such as CPT creation, the Metabox API (used to create custom fields), we will learn how to manipulate the database by adding and updating values in the metadata tables. We will learn how to control menus and submenus throughout the WordPress admin area.

Also within this first project, we will learn to master APIs such as Settings, Options, and the Shortcode API. We will use everything we learn in this section to control the appearance and behavior of the slideshow on the frontend.

The second project is a testimonial plugin. It looks simple, but the number of techniques that you will learn will surprise you.

In this project, we will review some subjects that you will have already seen in the previous section, and learn some new ones. We will learn a lot about the Widgets API and also how to control the HTML templates used in your plugin, including learning how to implement a simple template override system, which also includes learning how to create a specific theme_support for your plugin.

The third project is the most complete and the most complex of the three. Have you ever needed to create custom tables for your plugin? Do you have any idea how some of the best-known plugins, like WooCommerce (just to name one of them), do to create and manage tables outside of the WordPress realms? Do you know why they do this, what are the advantages and disadvantages? No? Great, because you are going to learn that in this course.

In the third project, you will learn about the WordPress $wpdb class, the one responsible for managing all the custom table CRUD operations in your application. You will learn how to create tables, run queries, add, update, and remove data from those tables, using various APIs that you have learned to master during the course, such as the Metabox and Shortcode APIs.

You will learn how to synchronize these actions so that your table works in tandem with the native WordPress tables. In addition, in this section, you will see how to provide a frontend interface where the site user can submit data, without having to access the WordPress admin. We will also see how to use WordPress' own user control system to manage user actions.


Who is this course for?

I recommend this course for programmers, IT students, web developers, web designers, or any freelancer or professional who works with PHP, HTML, and CSS. It is recommended that you have notions of object-oriented PHP because all plugins created in the course are based on classes and objects. It is also important that you know how to use the main MySQL commands.

Other than that, all professionals who want to learn how to create plugins are welcome. It is only necessary that you already have previous contact with WordPress and know how to install it on a local server at least.


How is this course different?

What my students like most is my excellent response time to their questions. You know, waiting too long can slow down your progress. So I always try to answer within 24 hours. You can be sure that you will never feel alone in this course.

Do you have any doubts? Here's what my student Captain Krik recently wrote about one of my courses:

"Fantastic teacher, everything is explained clearly and simply. The lessons deepen in a professional way the aspects most suitable for a developer, as promised by the author. A big thank you to Marcello who made me learn new and interesting things. I also immediately bought the WordPress course which promises the same things."

And this one is from my student Nate S:

"I was going to wait until I finish the course to leave a review, but I'm halfway through and I can already say it's one of the absolute best courses I've taken on Udemy. It does not waste your time dwelling on extraneous concepts like CSS and does not use any unnecessary technology that might require extra setup or become outdated like Webpack. It's straight to the point and extremely clear in every topic discussed in each video. He is also quick to respond and provides links for each topic as well as the full course code for easy troubleshooting. Just fantastic! If he makes another WordPress course, I will be taking it."

courseDetails.title: ISO 27001:2013 - Information Security Management System
courseDetails.shortDescription: Learn about ISO 27001:2013 ISMS Overview & Controls. You can do it!
courseDetails.longDescription:
This course is about ISO 27001:2013. The lecture style is presentation-with-voiceover. Firstly, I'll be explaining an overview of the standard at a high level. Then I will be discussing different clauses and controls in more detail. I'll be updating this course regularly to cover more and more areas in depth. Examining the curriculum content is going to help you understand the coverage.

So far, I've covered:

  • Annex A Control: Teleworking

  • Annex A Control: Asset Management

  • Annex A Control: Cryptography

  • Annex A Control: Communication Security

This standard is about creating an Information Management System. The goal of an ISMS is to protect the confidentiality & integrity of data while ensuring availability. You can apply this system to any type of organization of any size. It's based on the same core high-level structure as other management systems. The main clauses include:

  • Context of the organization

  • Leadership

  • Planning

  • Support

  • Operation

  • Performance Evaluation

  • Improvement

The second part of the standard is about controls. They are listed in Annex A, and are grouped into different categories. They provide organizations with a set of tools that can be used to achieve the objectives of their management system. The list is not exhaustive and more controls do exist and can be implemented. Regardless, it's important to understand the controls mentioned in Annex A and determine if they are applicable or useful to your organization.
targetAudiences: This course is about ISO 27000 family of standards. It's for people who want to increase their knowledge about this family of standards. I will be covering various clauses in this standard.

It equips you with the knowledge and tools required not only to manage SAP Activate projects effectively but also to earn your certification as an SAP Activate Project Manager.

This course offers a step-by-step walkthrough of the entire project management process within the SAP Activate framework. From project initiation to closure and certification preparation, you'll gain practical insights and skills to lead SAP projects to success.

Throughout the course, you will:

  • Gain a Solid Foundation: Understand the fundamentals of the SAP Activate Methodology, including its significance in project management. Explore the key roles vital to SAP Activate projects and the distinct phases that define the project lifecycle.

  • Prepare for SAP Activate Projects: Learn how to initiate projects effectively, define clear goals and objectives, identify and analyze stakeholders, create compelling project charters, and assemble high-performing project teams.

  • Plan Projects Effectively: Dive into the intricacies of project planning, including scoping, resource and timeline estimation, risk assessment, and project plan creation.

  • Execute with Excellence: Explore strategies for effective project execution, progress tracking, change management, communication, and quality assurance.

  • Monitor and Control: Learn to monitor and control project activities effectively, track key performance indicators, manage issues and risks, and handle change requests and scope adjustments.

  • Close Projects Successfully: Discover the steps involved in closing an SAP Activate project effectively, ensuring the successful delivery of project outcomes, capturing lessons learned, and transitioning to operational deployment.

  • Master SAP Activate Best Practices: Gain insights into best practices for successful SAP Activate project management, and delve deep into the role of a project manager within SAP Activate projects.

  • Prepare for Certification: Receive guidance and insights to prepare for the SAP Activate Project Manager certification, setting you on a path to becoming a certified professional in the field.

SAP Activate Project Manager is a role within SAP project management that is responsible for planning, executing, and overseeing SAP implementation projects using the SAP Activate methodology. SAP Activate is SAP's recommended approach for the implementation of SAP solutions, including their cloud-based solutions.

Here are some key responsibilities and functions typically associated with the SAP Activate Project Manager role:

  1. Project Planning: They are responsible for creating a comprehensive project plan, including defining project scope, objectives, timelines, resource requirements, and budget estimates.

  2. Team Leadership: The SAP Activate Project Manager assembles and leads the project team, ensuring that team members have the necessary skills and resources to complete their tasks effectively.

  3. Stakeholder Management: They identify and analyze project stakeholders, maintaining effective communication with them throughout the project lifecycle.

  4. Risk Management: Identifying potential risks and developing strategies to mitigate them is a critical aspect of the role. This includes assessing and managing technical, organizational, and business risks.

  5. Change Management: SAP projects often involve significant changes to existing processes and systems. The Project Manager is responsible for managing these changes, ensuring that they are effectively communicated and integrated into the project plan.

  6. Project Execution: They oversee the day-to-day execution of the project, ensuring that it stays on track and meets its objectives. This includes monitoring progress, addressing issues, and making adjustments as needed.

  7. Quality Assurance: Ensuring the quality of the project deliverables is essential. The Project Manager is responsible for setting and maintaining quality standards and ensuring that project work meets those standards.

  8. Documentation and Reporting: Keeping accurate records of project activities, milestones, and outcomes is crucial. The Project Manager generates regular reports for stakeholders and management.

  9. Closure and Handover: At the end of the project, the Project Manager ensures that all project objectives have been met, and all deliverables are finalized. They also oversee the transition of the project to the operations team or end-users.

  10. Certification Preparation: In some cases, the SAP Activate Project Manager may also assist team members in preparing for SAP certification related to the project.

In summary, the SAP Activate Project Manager plays a pivotal role in ensuring the successful planning, execution, and completion of SAP implementation projects. They are responsible for managing resources, risks, and stakeholders to deliver a project that aligns with organizational goals and meets the highest quality standards.

Join us on this educational journey and become a master in SAP Activate Project Management. Achieve excellence in project planning, execution, and closure while preparing for your SAP Activate Project Manager certification.

Enroll now and take the first step toward a rewarding career in SAP project management.

Thank you.

courseDetails.title: السمفونيات المخفية في التداول  لتكون متداولا ناجحا (الجزء 2)
courseDetails.shortDescription: إتقان التداول و إطلاق العنان و الكشف عن عشرة  سمفونيات متناغمة لتحقيق النجاح في  رحلة التداول الخاصة بك
courseDetails.longDescription:
سواءا كنت مبتدئًا في عالم التداول أو متداولًا ذو خبرة تتطلع إلى تعزيز مهاراتك  بعشرة أسرار قوية لنجاح  في التداول ,  قد تم تصميم هذه الدورة لتزويدك برؤى مختلقة و مخفية عكس ما يروج في الدورات التقليدية الأخرى


يمكن أن يضهر التداول  على أنه مجال سهل و مربح , لكن الحقيقة أنه  يتطلب مزيجًا من المعارف المتنوعة الأساسية  , و يتطلب  وجود صيغ  سحرية متناسقة   , مع وجود مبادئ  وأسرار مثبتة يعتمدها قلة قليلة من المتداولون الناجحون لتحقيق نتائج  ربحية متسقة و منظمة


خلال هذه الدورة ,  سوف تتعمق في عشرة أسرار مختارة بعناية والتي لديها القدرة على تغيير نهج التداول الخاص بك ,  تشمل هذه الأسرار مجموعة واسعة من الجوانب الحاسمة لنجاح  أي متداول ,  بما في ذلك حقيقة  إدارة المخاطر والتحكم العاطفي والتحليل الرياضي الممنهج , و  أفضل الطرق  لتحقيق ربح يومي منظم , و سمفونيات و أسرار مخفية أخرى


عندما ستكتشف هذه الأسرار,  سوف تكتسب فهمًا أعمق حول تداول الفوركس أو العقود الأجلة أو الأسواق الأخرى   , و سوف تكتسب تقنيات مخفية  لتفعيل هذه

الأسرار بفعالية في رحلة التداول الخاصة بك


من المهم أن تعلم أن هذه الأسرار ليست مفاهيم غير متصلة بل هي سيمفونيات مترابطة تعمل بانسجام لخلق أساس متين لنجاح أي متداول 

فمن خلال تفعيل جميع الأسرار العشرة ودمج بعضها مع بعض ، ستكون مجهزًا  و قادرا بشكل أفضل للتداول  بثقة  مع اتخاذ قرارات مستنيرة محكمة , وستكون قادرا على تحقيق ربح يومي


عندما ستبدأ هذه الدورة ,  كن مستعدًا لتحدي أفكارك و معلوماتك  الحالية حول التداول وتوسيع معرفتك بالشكل الصحيح ,  و تطوير المهارات المخفية لتصبح متداولًا ناجحًا


هذه  الأسرار العشرة ستمكنك من  إطلاق العنان لإمكانياتك وتضعك على الطريق الصحيح  نحو تحقيق أهدافك الربحية   بدقة وثقة


إذا كنت ترغب في معرفة المزيد حول ما يحتويه الجزء الأول من هذه   الدورة ، فإليك قائمة مختصرة


  • السمفونية الأولى , الأخطاء القاتلة أثناء التداول في الفوركس


  • السمفونية الثانية , التداول 5 في المئة من التوقيت الزمني هو أحد السمفونيات المفقودة لعيش أي متداول في الفوركس و العقود الأجلة و جميع الأسواق الأخرى


  • السمفونية الثالتة , أسرار و خفايا ادارة رأس المال الحقيقية


  • السمفونية الرابعة , الأساب الحقيقية للهلع و الخوف أثناء التداول , وطرق التغلب عليه بتقنيات رياضية


  • السمفونية الخامسة , الأخطاء القاتلة في تحليل سوق التداول و الفخ المخفي لخسارة أغلبية المتداولين


  • السمفونية السادسة , كشف اشارات مخادعة مخفية و طرق تجنب الوقوع ضحيتها


في  الجزء التاني من هذه الدورة التدريبية


  • السمفونية السابعة , الطرق المخفية لتحليل جميع الأسواق  بطرق رياضية و أفضل الطرق لتحديد أفضل نقاط البيع و الشراء


  • السمفونية التامنة , علم و أسرار وقف الخسارة و أخد الربح و الطريقة السرية لرفع نسبة نجاح جميع الصفقات


  • السمفونية التاسعة , سمفونية الربط بين الصفقات بطريقة رياضية مدروسة لتحقيق ربح يومي


  • السمفونية العاشرة , ماهو الأفضل هل التخصص في سوق واحد أم التداول في أسواق كثيرة , و ما هو أفضل توقيت زمني أمن لنجاح أي متداول



إذا كنت لا تزال غير متأكد ، فإليك ثلاثة أسئلة يمكنك استخدامها لإتخاذ القرار النهائي

    هل تريد أن تتعلم كيفية التداول   بالطرق الصحيحة و القوية و الأكثر أمانًا

    هل ترغب في إحتراف و إتقان التداول  و تحقيق ربح يومي

     هل تريد معرفة  أسرار و السمفونيات المخفية لتحقيق النجاح  في التداول  التي يجهلها أغلبية المتداولين 


إذا أجبت بنعم على أي من هذه الأسئلة ، فأعتقد أنه بناءً على خبرتي لأكثر من 20 سنة في التداول والاستثمارات المالية , ستستمتع بهذه الدورة ,  أستطيع أن أؤكد لك أن احتمالات استمتاعك بهذه الدورة ستكون عالية جدًا , بسبب المعلومات القيمة و الأسرار المخفية التي ستجدها هذه الدورة

شكرا جزيلا لقراءة كل هذا

أمل أن أراك متداول ناجحا بعد هذه الدورة التدريبية

هذه  الدورة تنقسم الى جزئين , الجزء الأول  في هذه الدورة سأكشف فيه عن ست سمفونيات  تحاكي الأسلحة الدفاعية  أثناء التداول و الجزء التاني سأكشف فيه  عن أربع سمفونيات تحاكي الأسلحة الهجومية أثناء التداول , ستكون  هذه   الدورة شاملة متكاملة لن تحتاج بعدها الى أي دورة أخرى , و أؤكد لك  أنك لن تجد مثل  هذه   المعلومات  الذهبية القيمة  في أي دورة أخرى
targetAudiences: إذا كنت تريد تحقيق ربح يومي منظم
إذا كنت تريد  تعلم فن التداول   بطريقة سهلة وغير معقدة
إذا كنت تريد تعلم أعظم إستراتيجية تداول أمنة , وأفضل مناطق البيع و الشراء ,  فهذه الدورة التدريبية هي الخريطة المناسبة لك
إذا كنت جديدًا في مجال التداول وترغب في بناء أساس متين ,  فهذه الدورة التدريبية لك. سوف تختصر عليك سنوات طويلة
إذا كنت مهتم بسوق الفوركس والعقود الأجلة وتريد تحسين و صقل مهاراتك بالشكل الصحيح , فهذه  الدورة التدريبية مناسبة لك

إذا كنت تحلم بأن تصبح متداولا ناجحا  ,  فهذه الدورة التدريبية هي خريطة الطريق الخاصة بك,  التي  ستوفر لك رؤى قيمة حول العقلية والإستراتيجيات وتقنيات إدارة المخاطر التي يستخدمها المتداولون المحترفون الناجحون

    Course Objectives:

courseDetails.title: Introduction to Basic 3D Modeling with Microsoft Paint 3D
courseDetails.shortDescription: Unlock 3D Creativity with Microsoft Paint 3D
courseDetails.longDescription:
Are you a budding artist, a creative kid, or simply curious about the world of 3D modeling? If so, our "Introduction to Basic 3D Modeling with Microsoft Paint 3D" course is the perfect starting point for you! Designed specifically for beginners, especially kids, and tailored for Windows 10 or 11 users, this course will take you on an exciting journey into the world of 3D design using two free and user-friendly software tools: Microsoft Paint 3D and 3D Viewer.


Course Highlights:

- No Prior Experience Required: This course is beginner-friendly and assumes no prior knowledge of 3D modeling or design. We'll start from scratch and guide you every step of the way.


- Kid-Friendly: Our course is designed with kids in mind. We use a simple and engaging approach to make learning 3D modeling fun and accessible for young learners.


- Windows 10 or 11 Compatible: If you're using Windows 10 or 11, you're in the right place! We'll show you how to harness the power of these operating systems to create 3D art.


- Free Software: You don't need to purchase expensive software. We'll utilize two free tools, Microsoft Paint 3D and 3D Viewer, both readily available on your Windows computer.



By the end of this course, you will have the skills and confidence to create basic 3D models, including a charming house and an inviting open 3D room. Whether you're a child or just a beginner looking to explore the world of 3D art, this course provides an accessible and enjoyable introduction to the exciting realm of 3D modeling using readily available, free software. Join us on this creative journey, and let your imagination soar in three dimensions!
targetAudiences: Perfect for beginners, especially kids, new to 3D modeling.

courseDetails.title: How to Build an Event Management Website with WordPress
courseDetails.shortDescription: Learn how to create a professional event management website without experience - a step-by-step tutorial!
courseDetails.longDescription:
Are you ready to take your event planning and management skills to the next level? In today's digital age, having a stunning and functional event management website is essential for success. Whether you're an event planner, coordinator, or simply passionate about organizing events, this comprehensive online course is your ticket to creating a professional and impressive online presence.

In "How to Build an Event Management Website with WordPress," I will guide you through the entire process of designing, and building a feature-rich event management website using the world's most popular and user-friendly content management system, WordPress. No coding or technical expertise is required – just your enthusiasm and desire to create something exceptional.

What You'll Learn:

  1. Setting Up WordPress: Hands-on tutorials on selecting the right hosting, installing WordPress, and configuring essential settings for your website.

  2. Choosing and Customizing a Theme: Discover how to pick the ideal theme for your event management site and customize it to match your brand and event style.

  3. Creating and Managing Content: Learn how to add and organize event listings, speakers, schedules, and other essential content elements.

  4. Integration and Functionality: Enhance your website's capabilities with plugins and integrations for ticket sales.

  5. Design and User Experience: Dive into the world of web design and user experience principles to create a visually appealing and user-friendly site.

  6. Search Engine Optimization (SEO): Unlock the secrets of SEO to ensure your website ranks high in search results and attracts more attendees.

By the end of this course, you will have a fully functional event management website with a low budget and no coding knowledge. Whether you're planning corporate conferences, weddings, music festivals, or any other events, this course will empower you to create a stunning online presence that attracts attendees and sets you apart in the industry.

Join me on this exciting journey to master event management website creation with WordPress and turn your passion for events into a thriving online business. Enroll now and start building your dream website today!
targetAudiences: Event planner or people who are passionate about organizing events
Web development agencies who wants to make event management websites for their clients.

courseDetails.title: Pembuatan Website Landing Page Dengan HTML dan CSS
courseDetails.shortDescription: Pengembangan aplikasi berbasis website
courseDetails.longDescription:
Kursus ini secara khusus dibuat untuk membantu para peserta mempelajari cara mengembangkan halaman arahan situs web yang indah dan berguna secara efektif menggunakan HTML dan CSS. Peserta kursus akan mendapatkan pemahaman menyeluruh tentang dasar-dasar HTML, yang sangat penting untuk membangun kerangka kerja halaman web, seperti yang diuraikan dalam materi kursus. Mereka akan memiliki pemahaman menyeluruh tentang cara menggunakan komponen dan kualitas yang penting untuk membuat konten yang berhasil. Peserta kursus juga akan belajar tentang CSS, bahasa style yang memungkinkan penerapan style, warna, dan tata letak yang indah untuk meningkatkan daya tarik estetika.


Para peserta akan bekerja melalui berbagai aktivitas langsung dan proyek yang menuntut seiring berjalannya kursus, memberi mereka kesempatan untuk membuat landing page dari awal. Para peserta akan menemukan cara mengintegrasikan HTML dan CSS secara efektif untuk menghasilkan tampilan yang menarik dan cakap. Mereka juga akan diinstruksikan dalam prinsip-prinsip desain responsif, yang membantu menjamin bahwa halaman web dapat ditampilkan dengan sempurna di berbagai perangkat, mulai dari komputer desktop hingga ponsel pintar.


Kursus ini sangat ideal untuk para developer yang ingin meningkatkan kemampuan HTML dan CSS mereka dan para pemula yang ingin memulai petualangan mereka dalam dunia pembuatan website. Peserta yang berhasil menyelesaikan kursus ini akan memiliki pengetahuan dan kemampuan yang dibutuhkan untuk membuat halaman arahan situs web yang menarik secara visual dan fungsional menggunakan HTML dan CSS. Kursus ini menawarkan kesempatan yang tak ternilai harganya untuk mengembangkan keterampilan dalam menciptakan tampilan digital yang menawan dan menarik perhatian.
targetAudiences: Student yang ingin mempelajari mengenai HTML dan CSS
